#Example: Large parts of Africa and south east Asia

	1203 1204 1205 1206 1207 1208 1209 1210 1211 1212 1213 1214 1215 1216 1217 1218 1219 1220 1221 1222 1223 1224 1225
	1226 1227 1228 1229 1230 1231 1232 1233 1234 1796 1797 1798 1799 1800 1801

	567 569 570 579 580 581 583 584 585 586 587 588 589 590 591 592 593 594 595 596 597 598 599 600 601 602 603 604 605
	# South East Asia

	# Wasteland
	1789 1796 1797 1798 1799 1800 1801 1802 1803
}

}

#Example: Most of Europe north of med.
mild_winter = {
	# Scandinavia
  	6 12 13 14 15 26 1981 1982 1983 1984
	# German North Sea Coast
	44 54 55 1775 1931
	# The Low Countries
	87 88 89 90 91	92 93 94 95 96 97 98 99 100 1742 1743 1744 1866 1865 1878
	# North and West of France
 	167 168 169 170 171 172 173 174 175 176 177 178 179 180 181 182 183 184 185 186 187 188 189 190 191 192 193 194 195 196
	198 199 203 204
	# North Coast of Spain
	206 207 209 1745
	# Northern Italy
	103 104 107 108 111 1769 1862 1875
	# England
	233 234 235 236 237 238 239 240 241 242 243 244 245 1860 1861
	# Border with the Med
	128 132 139 140 141 150 152 1765 1766
	# Black sea coast
	159 268 282 284 285 286 287 1764
	# Central Anatolia
	322 323 326 329 331 1846 1848
	# Central Iran
	413 414 415 416 417 418 419 420 421 424 425 426 428 432 433 435 436 446 447 577
	# Border of Stepp
	427 437 438 439 440 441 442 443 454 455 457 459 456 461 464 712 714
	# Central and northenr China
	693 695 696 697 703 704 723 726 1816  701 702 713 715 717 718 719
	720 721 722 725 728 729 730 731 732 733 734 735 736 737 1786 1845 1850 699
	# Hilly bits of Northern India
	506 511 
	# Wintery bits of the west coast
	871 872 972
	# West coast of Japan
	863 875 877 882 885 891 892 896 899 900 916 917 918 934 935 936 937 939 940 942 948 941 950 953 1808 1012 1013 1017 1018
	1023 1024 1025 1026 1818 1826 1830 1831 1837
	# Wasteland
	1784 1787 1808 1786
	#
	1774 129 131 1828 1827 1974 1973 1970 1969
}

#Example: Inland Europe & Scandinavia
normal_winter = {
	# Scandinavia
	1 2 3 4 5 7 8 9 16 17 22 23 24 25 27 28 29 34 35 36 37 38 39 1930 1985
	# The Baltic Coast
	40 41 42 43 45 46 47 48
	# Inland Germany
	49 50 51 52 53 56 57 58 59 60 61 62 63 64 65 66 67 68 69 70 71 72 74 75 76 77 78 79 80 81 82 83 84 85 86 1757 1758 1759 1760
	1761 1762 1763 1858 1857 1859 1874 1876 1880
	# Austria and the Balkans
	133 134 135 153 154 155 156 157 158 160 161 162 1756 1767 1770 1772 1863 1864
	# Scotland
	246 247 248 249 250 251 252 253
	# Poland and Lithunania
	254 255 256 257 258 259 260 261 262 263 264 265 266 267 269 270 271 272 273 274 275 276 277 278 279 280 281 283 288 289 290
	291 292 1771
	# Ireland
	372 373 374 375 376
	# The not quite so cold parts of the Stepp
	465 466 467 468 469 470 471 472 473 474 475 476 477 478 479  480
	# Mountians in Afghanistan
	444 445 450 453
	# Mountians in China
	698 707 708 709
	716 724 727 1032 1033 1048 1049 1050 1056 1057 1058 1060 1063 1065 1066 
	# Cold bits of the west coast
	873 874 973 878 879 880 881 889 890 898 902 905 913 914 915 943 946 947 949 951 952 954 955 956 957 958 959 960 961 962 963
	964 965 966 967 968 969 970 971 980 981 982 983 984 985 989 990
	# Wasteland
	1809
	#
	1954 1951 1952 1953 1940 1939 1841 1938 1935 1936 1937 1842 1834 1960 1941 1942 1943 1944 1945 1965 1966 1967 1968
}

#Example: Russia & Lappland
severe_winter = {
	# Scandinavia
	10 11 18 19 20 21 30 31 32 33
	# The Alps
	73 110 165 166 205 1768 1867 1868 1869 1870 1871 1872 1873
	# The Pyraneese
	210 211 212
	# Mother Russia
	293 294 295 296 297 298 299 300 301 302 303 304 305 306	307 308 309 310 311 312 313 314 315 1752 1753 1754 1755 1776 1777 1778
	1780 1781 1782 1783
	# The Cold North
	369 370 371 1104 1105
	# Those High Mountians in Asia
	448 449 451 452 458 460 508 509 554 557 565 578 676 677 678 705 706 710 711 739
	# Siberia
	1034 1035 1036 1037 1038 1039 1040 1041 1042 1043 1044 1045 1046 1047 1051 1052 1053 1054 1055 1059 1061 1062 1064 1067 1068 1069
	1070 1071 1072 1073 1074 1075 1076 1077 1078 1079 1080 1081 1082 1083
	# The Caucasus
	422 423 462 463 1856
	# Alaska
	974 975 976 977 978 979 1804 1805 1806 1807 1809 1810 1811 1812 1813 1814 901 903 904 906 907 908 909 910 911 912 944 945 987 988
	991 992 993 986 994 995 996 997 998 999 1000 1001 1002 1003 1004 1005 1006 1007 1008 1009 1010 1011
	# Wasteland
	1780 1781 1782 1783 1785 1804 1805 1806 1807 1810 1811 1812 1813 1814 1784 1785 1787
	#
	1961 1959 1957 1956 1958 1955 1964 1962 1963 1972 511
}
